name: Withered Thoughts
description:
Fear the unknown, Don't give in...

Welcome to Withered Thoughts!
The Anxiety Gods stalk the forest, Traverse a beautifully depressing environment as you complete the ritual, and set your world free from the suicide-inducing fear that lurks just beyond the tree's... DEATH is never more, than a heartbeat away.

Estimated Completion time 45 minutes - 1 hour (This game has no save system, And is meant to be finished in one sitting.)

If you like what you saw here, Imagine what I could do with actual funding! as i am one person building these alone for your enjoyment,  Consider a donation! it will ensure more games like this get made in the future! Thanks for your time and enjoy the game!

Additional Credits:
Radio Voice: Robert Mills
Music by: Somnium Music (Youtube Channel)
Player Voice: Dillon Burris (Developer)

Follow me on Twitter for news about all my upcoming projects!: https://twitter.com/HorrorInTheNest
